ally found a terinal after a few long minutes of trudging down the halls.=

s.=A0 Rodimus was int he CR chambers, but thee were decpeticons and a Preda=

<table cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" border="0" ><tr><td valign="top" style="font: inherit;"><DIV>Megatron X stormed down corridor aftercorridor, catching only a few Predacons by surprise.  Upon seeing them his beam saber would arc through their body, roughly cleaving them and leaving them to perish if they had not done so immediatly.  He had't the faintest idea where anythin was, but he finally found a terinal after a few long minutes of trudging down the halls.  He found a few Decepticons, the main CR area, and then the leader Hydras.  Rodimus was int he CR chambers, but thee were decpeticons and a Predacon leader ere as well... they'd ave to g too.  But what to do first?  Ah yes...</DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV>"You Predacons keep a very loose security here," the might Decepticon mocked through the intercoms spread all over the fortress.  "I much doubtyou knew i was hre until now.  Well now listen good; I want to this to be challenging, hopefully you can accomidate.  Very shortly I will begin an indiscrimant attack on all in tis Fortress.  Show me how you fight you worthless upstart!"<BR><BR>--- On <B>Fri, 11/21/08, xochitla2006 <I><xochitla2006@...></I></B> wrote:<BR></DIV>
<BLOCKQUOTE style="PADDING-LEFT: 5px; MARGIN-LEFT: 5px; BORDER-LEFT: rgb(16,16,255) 2px solid">From: xochitla2006 <xochitla2006@...><BR>Subject: Re: A Spark of Hope<BR>To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com<BR>Date: Friday, November 21, 2008, 3:06 AM<BR><BR>
<DIV id=yiv1838690670>
<DIV id=ygrp-text>
<DIV>Hydras/Jhiaxus/ darkhawk:<BR><BR>"Have you forgot your maners Cyclonus?"hissed Hydras while he appears <BR>followed Jhiaxus and Darkhawk"why do you scream as if I were a slave?" <BR><BR>> <BR>> Rodimus was still secure and blissfully asleep in his recharging <BR>chamber. <BR>> <BR>> However Cyclonus and Scourge were another matter as they strode<BR>> through the fortress. "HYDRAS!" Cyclonus' voice echoed through the<BR>> corridoers, "I demand that you stand before me! Now!"<BR>> <BR>> Scourge walked a pace or two behind, searching down the halls as they<BR>> passed them, content for the moment to be silent.<BR>> <BR>> Preston<BR>><BR><BR></DIV></DIV></DIV></BLOCKQUOTE></td></tr></table><br>
